languages.text: тебя это волнует? я видел как твоего начальника смены уводили в комнатку откуда никто не возвращается. Нет у тебя больше начальника
"Тебя паек волнует? Твоего начальника смены увели в комнатку, откуда никто не возвращается. Ты запросто можешь быть следующим".
"You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."
languages.original_text: "Тебя паек волнует? Твоего начальника смены увели в комнатку, откуда никто не возвращается. Ты запросто можешь быть следующим".

traits.locale_text: "Are you worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a small room. Nobody comes out of that room. You don't have a foreman anymore."
"Are you worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a small room. Nobody comes out of that room. You don't have a foreman anymore."
"You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."
"You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a small room. Nobody comes out of that room. You don't have a foreman anymore."
"You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."
"You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."
"You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."

languages.text: « Aucun risque de ce côté-là. Je l'ai vu, ton contremaître... Ils l'ont emmené dans un réduit dont personne ressort jamais. Va savoir, ce sera peut-être ton tour, la prochaine fois. »
languages.original_text: "You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."

traits.locale_text: « Aucun risque de ce côté-là. Je l'ai vu, ton contremaître... Ils l'ont emmené dans un réduit dont personne ressort jamais. Va savoir, ce sera peut-être ton tour, la prochaine fois. »

languages.text: «¿Te preocupan las raciones? He visto que se llevaban a tu encargado a una salita. Nadie sale de ella. Puede que después vayas tú».
languages.original_text: "You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."

traits.locale_text: «¿Te preocupan las raciones? He visto que se llevaban a tu encargado a una salita. Nadie sale de ella. Puede que después vayas tú».

languages.text: “你还担心口粮？我看到那些人把你的领班带到了一个小房间里。从来没有人从那个房间里出来过，说不定下一个就轮到你了。”
languages.original_text: "You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."

traits.locale_text: “你还担心口粮？我看到那些人把你的领班带到了一个小房间里。从来没有人从那个房间里出来过，说不定下一个就轮到你了。”

languages.text: 「配給について心配なのか？お前の監督が、一度入ったら誰も出てこない小部屋に連れて行かれるのを見たよ。次はお前かもしれない」
languages.original_text: "You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."

traits.locale_text: 「配給について心配なのか？お前の監督が、一度入ったら誰も出てこない小部屋に連れて行かれるのを見たよ。次はお前かもしれない」

languages.text: Ihr habt Angst um Eure Rationen? Ich sah, wie Euer Vorarbeiter in einen kleinen Raum gebracht wurde, aus dem niemand mehr herauskommt. Ihr könntet als Nächstes dran sein.
languages.original_text: "You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."

traits.locale_text: Ihr habt Angst um Eure Rationen? Ich sah, wie Euer Vorarbeiter in einen kleinen Raum gebracht wurde, aus dem niemand mehr herauskommt. Ihr könntet als Nächstes dran sein.

languages.text: "Kumanyaların için mi endişeleniyorsun? Ustabaşını küçük bir odaya aldıklarını gördüm. O odaya giren bir daha çıkmaz. Sırada sen olabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You're worried about your rations? I saw them take your foreman to a little room that nobody ever comes out of again. You might be next."
